featured.text: Autograph dealers can be found in almost any sizable city, and collectors may get hundreds, even thousands, of dollars for things signed by anyone from Mozart to Madonna, Thomas Jefferson to JFK.

definition.zh_def: 美國第35任總統約翰·F·甘迺迪的簡稱，他於1961年至1963年任職，並在任內推動多項重要政策。
definition.en_def: Abbreviation for John F. Kennedy, the 35th President of the United States, who served from 1961 to 1963 and is known for significant policies.
definition.example: JFK delivered a famous speech about civil rights in 1963.
